title: Darning Sampler, 1824
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in running and satin stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Fourteen squares of pattern darning, a square of simulated knitting, two insert patches, one with initials and date, two inset corners, and small squares of decorative stitchery.

tombstone.epitaph:
Darning Sampler, 1824.
1824. Medium: silk embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in running and satin stitches on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-210.
